titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funerall of Mrs. Alice Bray, wife to Francis Bray of Farthingo, neere Brackley in the county of Northampton, Gent. Vpon Psalme 37. and vers. 37. March the 2. 1645. / By W.I. minister there.
titleStmt.author: W. I.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
